content.text: To request the deletion of your account and all associated data in Tikky, follow these steps:

items: Step 2: Use the subject line: "Account Deletion Request - Tikky"
Step 3: Include in the email body the email address associated with your account
Step 4: Optionally, you can provide a reason for deletion (this helps us improve)

content.text: Once we receive your request, we will process the deletion of your account following these timeframes:

items: Initial confirmation: You will receive a confirmation email within 48 hours of your request
Processing: Complete deletion will be carried out within a maximum of 30 business days
Final notification: We will send you an email confirming that the deletion has been completed

content.title: Important note:
content.text: During the processing period, your account will remain inactive and you will not be able to access it.
When processing your deletion request, the following data will be permanently deleted:

items: Profile information: Name, email address, profile picture, and date of birth
Tickets and receipts: All scanned images and data extracted from your tickets
Custom categories: All expense categories you have created
App preferences: Language, currency settings, and other preferences
Usage history: Activity logs and app usage patterns
Subscription data: Subscription status and in-app purchase history

content.text: For legal and operational reasons, some data may be retained in a limited manner:

items: Anonymized records: Aggregated statistical data that cannot personally identify you
Transaction records: Payment processing information required by tax obligations (retained for 5 years as required by applicable law)

content.title: Backup retention period:
content.text: System backups are retained for 90 days for security purposes. After this period, all your data will be permanently deleted from our backup systems.
If you have questions about the account deletion process or need additional assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us:

content.title: Confirmation:
content.text: You will always receive an email confirmation when your request has been fully processed. If you don't receive any communication within 48 hours, please check your spam folder or contact us again.
